Charlie Sheen has his scandal. They keep hiring you guys. Me, I got fired. They took me to court and sued me. What did I do wrong? I mentioned where I work... You guys are up to shenanigans I'm back stage looking over everyone going:` Did you have sex with David Letterman ?'. Howard Stern was sued by CBS in 2006 when the company accused him of using his terrestrial radio air time to promote his new satellite radio gig at Sirius. friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelly, she told NBC's`` Meet The Press.'' Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said.`` It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury,'' she added.
